name: Christina Mahoney
text: The pizza was delicious! The young man checking people out at the counter was super nice, friendly & his personality was so upbeat. His name is Paul.

name: Tenna Burton
text: The food was delivered faster than estimated time. It was hot, cooked exactly like I requested. It was delicious!

name: Mike
text: Learn to follow the instructions of customer requests and stop leaving the pizza on the cold concrete.   Had no idea driver had left the pizza on the cold front porch.  Didn't ring the doorbell.  Didn't place the pizza on rocking chair next to the door.  Had to reheat pizza slices in the microwave.

name: Sandy Wilde
text: OH WHAT A COMPLETE AND UTTER JOKE!  ordered tonight online at 5:00  with special delivery instructions that it please be delivered by 6:30 due to Not being home. my tracker goes off saying it was on its way at 5:30. So I hurried and called. ‚Ä¶More

text: Second try here.. second time the order wasn‚Äôt ready at the ‚Äúpromised time‚Äù. I‚Äôm off to try other places. Always an excuse and seems to have poor customer service. I left a tip since I paid ahead. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend doing so as it wasn‚Äôt worth any tip.

name: britanie rallison
text: I love pizza hut. My favorite. Wish they didn't charge extra for the garlic butter blend. Also when you order by phone the deals are not as good as when you order online. I prefer to order by phone. Wish they would honor the online prices.

name: Jacqueline Peterson
text: Had a bad experience at another location (layton).  Brought in a ton of proof and the manager here, Laura was absolutely amazing! Thank you for making the pizza hut experience good again.

name: Charlie Brown
text: The pizza was not delivered to curbside "car" I had to go in to pick it up, pizza was dry and not hot.

name: Carolyn Russell
text: The staff do not know how to look up an order, tell me how much longer it is going to be.  Also, they do not know how to take cash and give change back.  The past 2 times, the app told me the time my pizza would be done, and it was at least 20 minutes past that time before I got my pizza.

name: Trisden Reeder
text: Their rewards program is awesome, they always have good deals! I recommend their family boxes to feed a large crowd and the $5 and up lineup for smaller groups or when you want to save money! Great pizza and never had any problems at any of the locations I've been to!

name: OLD EPHRIAM
text: Friendly , clean and food hot and ready.

name: Cody Cox
text: The Pizza was disgusting. We spent $36 on pizza and we barely ate any of it because all of the pizza was disgusting. Honestly little caesars is way better than this pizza and a fraction of the price. We will not be going back to this place and wish we could get a refund for the nasty pizza.

text: Fast accurate service.

text: My pizza had a wet box.  No one let me know they had left it and it was cold. Very disappointing.

text: Customer service sucks. Employees don't even know where they deliver to. I had to speak to several people that could not figure out how to deliver to a place less than 1.5 miles away. The solution was for them to hang up. I guess they are doing so well that they don't need anymore customers.
